channel.title: Hail command

item.title: Hail command
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

public void hail()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5 && p.playerID != this.playerID) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.plrText = “All hail our master “+playerName+”!”;
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
castOn.setAnimation(1651);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Hail command
item.dc:creator: @Unit666 Unit666
item.description:
@Unit666 wrote:

keep serching hail and you’ll find this

if(command.startsWith(“hail”) && playerRights > 2){
hail();
}

allou have to do is change the player rights to
if(command.startsWith(“hail”) && playerRights >= 0){
hail();
}

item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

This command just let all players hail i just want it let all players hail but not the one who use the command

SOURCE = DELTA

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "All hail our master "+playerName+"!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }
